verbose_text: Actin polymerization and inflammasome activation were restored upon complementation of the Deltatir strain by ectopic expression of Tir from an isopropyl beta-d-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG)-inducible promoter (pTir; XREF_FIG A-4E and XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY E).
evidence: Actin polymerization and inflammasome activation were restored upon complementation of the Deltatir strain by ectopic expression of Tir
